verses.text: Praise ye the Lᴏʀᴅ. Praise the Lᴏʀᴅ, O my soul.
While I live will I praise the Lᴏʀᴅ: I will sing praises unto my God while I have any being.
Put not your trust in princes, nor in the son of man, in whom there is no help.
His breath goeth forth, he returneth to his earth; in that very day his thoughts perish.
Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the Lᴏʀᴅ his God:
Which made heaven, and earth, the sea, and all that therein is: which keepeth truth for ever:
Which executeth judgment for the oppressed: which giveth food to the hungry. The Lᴏʀᴅ looseth the prisoners:
The Lᴏʀᴅ openeth the eyes of the blind: the Lᴏʀᴅ raiseth them that are bowed down: the Lᴏʀᴅ loveth the righteous:
The Lᴏʀᴅ preserveth the strangers; he relieveth the fatherless and widow: but the way of the wicked he turneth upside down.
The Lᴏʀᴅ shall reign for ever, even thy God, O Zion, unto all generations. Praise ye the Lᴏʀᴅ.
